title: Hoops Tonight - NBA Free Agency reaction: Kevin Durant requests trade from Nets, Kyrie to Lakers?
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - NBA Free Agency reaction: Kevin Durant requests trade from Nets, Kyrie to Lakers?
description:
Jason reacts to Kevin Durant requesting a trade, discusses the possibility of Kyrie heading to the Lakers, and breaks down his favorite and least favorite moves of the day. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
